main event: On October 10, 1967, a witness observed a silvery unidentified flying object in Lakewood, Colorado.
interesting points: The object appeared suddenly and remained motionless for about 7 minutes,The witness estimated the object's speed to be between 2000 and 5000 M.P.H.,The object was described as being about the size of a basketball,The witness reported the object made a whirring, whining sound,The sighting was originally reported to the Air Force, and the witness was later contacted for additional questions.
witness description: The witness is a 52-year-old male who was outdoors at the time of the sighting.
